title: Looking to free up storage but images listed for over 24GB
content:
When I navigate to storage, "Images" are listed to take up 24+GB. When I open my files app and look at the storage associated with "Images" there, it's only 51MB.

Why are these different?

I've connected my Pixel 3 to a PC and have manually deleted images/videos in app folders like WhatsApp/Telegram already. I have deleted a majority of the pictures on my phone, deleted backed up photos/videos...yet still, Images shows for over 24GB under "Storage".

I've tried turning it off & on again three times.
